extends ClientAuthHandler
    Client-side auth handler using HttpURLConnection...

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean endorseRequest(String accessToken, HttpURLConnection conn)
      "Signs" or "endorses" the request.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.miniauth.web.AuthHandler

        getCredentialMapper

    • Method Detail

      • endorseRequest

        boolean endorseRequest(String accessToken,
                     HttpURLConnection conn)
                       throws MiniAuthException,
                              IOException
        "Signs" or "endorses" the request. In the context of OAuth, this method should be really called signRequest(). However, we (plan to) use this for other auth schemes, hence we use a more generic (but somewhat unusual name), "endorse".
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Auth token needed for making a request.
        conn - URLConnection. conn is an "in-out" param.
        Returns:
        true if "endorsing" is successful.
        Throws:
        MiniAuthException
        IOException
